name: Ancient Coin
passive: Favor: Nearby enemy minions that die without you killing them drop coins that grant gold and mana.
description: Item that provides Health. Passive effect: Nearby enemy minions that die without you killing them drop coins that grant gold and mana.. Perfect for frontline champions who need to absorb damage.
tips: Perfect for enhancing your team's capabilities
Helps protect and empower your carries
The active/passive effect can turn the tide of team fights
Provides excellent sustain in lane and during fights
The healing/lifesteal helps you stay in fights longer
